    • Method Detail

      • getUserBalance

        @GetMapping("/userbalance/{dni}")
public java.lang.Double getUserBalance​(@PathVariable
                                       int dni)
        Returns the amount of balance that the user has on his card.
        Parameters:
        dni - ID of the user whose card balance we are going to verify.
        Returns:
        Returns the amount of the user's balance on the card.

      • addBalance

        @PutMapping("/addbalance")
public void addBalance​(@RequestBody
                       Reload R)
                throws WrongTransactionException
        Carry out a reload on a user's card.
        Parameters:
        R - Reload data.
        Throws:
        WrongTransactionException - If the operation to be performed fails because the data entered is incorrect.

      • payauthoritation

        @PutMapping("/payauthoritation/{dni}")
public void payauthoritation​(@RequestBody
                             Order o,
                             @PathVariable
                             int dni)
        Send an email to the user with the validation code to make the payment of a specific order.
        Parameters:
        o - The specific order to pay.
        dni - The ID of the user who is going to pay for the order.

      • payregister

        @PutMapping("/payregister/{ncard}")
public void payregister​(@RequestBody
                        Payment p,
                        @PathVariable
                        int ncard)
                 throws WrongTransactionException
        Register the payment of an order with a specific card.
        Parameters:
        p - Payment data.
        ncard - The number of the card with which we are going to make the payment.
        Throws:
        WrongTransactionException - If the operation to be performed fails because the data entered is incorrect.

      • payComfirm

        @PutMapping("/payconfirm/{code}")
public void payComfirm​(int userId,
                       int orderId,
                       @PathVariable("code")
                       java.lang.String code)
        Check that the payment has been made correctly and the order status has been changed to PAYED.
        Parameters:
        ou - Map containing the ID of the order and the ID of the user to whom the order belongs.
        code - Validation code for the payment of the specific order
